description: Refactor portfolio grid components: rename and separate exhibit, profile, and collection grids; improve critique button owner/viewer behavior and submission lightbox options.
Add critiques section to routes and sidebar; add English and Spanish translations; extend RecentSubmissionsCarousel props and adjust knip breadcrumb paths.
Refactor Home page and RecentSubmissionsCarousel: remove gallery link and simplify user display for anonymity.
Add site settings management and homepage hero functionality.
Organize skills folders to work across agents.
Refactor CritiqueManagerModal and PortfolioItemForm; add message when critiques are disabled for private submissions; update English and Spanish translations.
Update dependencies for stability and performance; refactor CritiqueManagerModal for better editing and display states.
Add dedicated critiques page and refactor CritiqueButton to link to it; visibility by user role and submission status.
Remove CritiqueManagerModal in favor of critiques page; update CRITIQUE.md and English/Spanish translations.
Add critiques link to creator navigation and sidebar; dedicated critiques page, routes, and translations; improve active state for critique nav items.
